title: Google AI Blog
description: The work we're doing to make AI helpful for everyone.

title: Andrej Karpathy
description: Philosophical and intuitive understandings of neural networks

title: Towards Data Science
description: Publish AI, ML & data-science insights to a global community of data professionals.

title: OpenAI research
description: We believe our research will eventually lead to artificial general intelligence, a system that can solve human-level problems. Our mission is to ensure that AGI benefits all of humanity.

title: Hugging Face blog
description: The heartbeat of open-source AI. This is where you find out about new open-weight models (Llama, Mistral), optimization techniques (quantization, LoRA), and community trends.

title: Google DeepMind Blog
description: Focuses heavily on AGI research, reinforcement learning, and AI for science (e.g., AlphaFold).

title: Epoch AI
description: They research the limits of AI. Their blogs feature clean, academic graphs on "Training Compute Trends" or "Data Exhaustion"
